titles.title: 302 Children Of The Heavenly Father (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Children of the
Heavenly Father
Safely in His bosom gather
Nestling bird nor star in heaven
Such a refuge e'er was given

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
God His own doth tend and nourish
From all evil things He spares them
In His mighty
Arms He bears them

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Neither life nor death shall ever
From the Lord His children sever
Unto them His grace He showeth
And their sorrows all He knoweth

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Praise the Lord in joyfull numbers
Your Protector
never slumbers
At the will
Of your Defender
Every foe man must surrender

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Though He giveth or He taketh
God His children ne'er forsketh
His the loving
purpose solely
To preserve them pure and holy
